qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Help and Documentation: Design for use without documentation. Provide easy-to-use task-oriented help.

qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Adopt the User's Viewpoint: Speak the user's language (avoid jargon). Make use of existing knowledge (familiar mental models).

qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Simple and Natural Dialogue: Avoid extraneous information, steps, actions. Information should be in a logical, natural order.
